privacyModal.title: Personal Data Usage Notice

desc.line1: This Excel file contains students' personal data.
desc.line2: This information may be used only for academic administration and internal operations. Any use beyond purpose, third-party sharing, unauthorized storage, or external leakage is prohibited.
desc.line3: In accordance with relevant laws, access and download history for personal data is recorded and managed as administrator logs. Violations may result in legal liability.
desc.line4: I have fully understood the above and agree to the use of personal data.

privacyModal.agreeLabel: I agree to the above use of personal data.
